Video

2024 U.S. Total Eclipse Explained

Feb 27, 2024|2:13

A rare total solar eclipse will occur across Mexico, the U.S., and Canada on April 8, 2024, when the moon will pass between the Earth and the Sun, blocking the sun’s rays during the day PAGE, causing a temporary period of darkness. PAGE Editor-at-Large Jeffrey Kluger explains the best way to experience it.
